00032 typedef struct {
00033   int* ng;
00034   int* idx;
00035   int* xi;

00039 Parameterization ParameterizationAMDd = {
00040   name : "AMDd",

00050 // number of real parameter of a Gaussian
00051 #define NGAUSS 10

00054 void AMDdclone(const Para* q, Para* qp)
00055 {
00056   int i;
00057 
00058   strcpy(qp->name, q->name);
00059   qp->A = q->A; qp->Z = q->Z; qp->N = q->N;
00060   qp->n = q->n;
00061 
00062   qp->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00063   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00064     qp->x[i] = q->x[i];
00065 
00066   qp->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00067   qp->internals = malloc(sizeof(AMDdInternals));
00068   AMDdInternals *qpint = qp->internals;
00069   AMDdInternals *qint = q->internals;
00070 
00071   qpint->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00072   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00073     qpint->ng[i] = qint->ng[i];
00074   qpint->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00075   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00076     qpint->idx[i] = qint->idx[i];
00077   qpint->xi = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00078   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00079     qpint->xi[i] = qint->xi[i];
00080 
00081 }

00084 #define BUFSIZE 255
00085 
00086 int AMDdread(FILE* fp, Para* q)
00087 {
00088   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00089   int i;
00090   AMDdInternals* qint;
00091   
00092   qint = q->internals = (AMDdInternals*) malloc(sizeof(AMDdInternals));
00093 
00094   do
00095     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00096   while (strncmp(buf, "<Para ", 5) && !feof(fp));
00097   if (feof(fp)) {
00098     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Para ...>\n");
00099     return -1;
00100   }
00101   
00102   char Pname[80], qname[80];
00103 
00104   sscanf(buf, "<Para %s %s>", Pname, qname);
00105   if (strcmp(Pname, "AMDd")) {
00106     fprintf(stderr, "not a AMDd parameter set\n");
00107     return -1;
00108   }
00109   strcpy(q->name, stripstr(qname, ">"));
00110 
00111   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00112   if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d %d", &q->A, &q->Z, &q->N) != 3) {
00113     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00114     return -1;
00115   }
00116   if (q->A != q->Z+q->N) {
00117     fprintf(stderr, "proton and neutron number don't sum up in line\n>>%s<<\n",
00118             stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00119     return -1;
00120   }
00121   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00122   if (sscanf(buf, "%d", &q->ngauss) != 1) {
00123     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00124     return -1;
00125   }
00126 
00127   qint->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00128   qint->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00129   qint->xi = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00130   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++) {
00131     qint->idx[i] = 0;
00132     qint->ng[i] = 0;
00133     qint->xi[i] = 0;
00134   }
00135   
00136   q->n = q->ngauss*NGAUSS+2;
00137   q->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00138 
00139   int k, xi; 
00140   double a0, a1;
00141   double chi0re, chi0im, chi1re, chi1im;
00142   double b0re, b0im, b1re, b1im, b2re, b2im; 
00143 
00144   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00145   if (sscanf(buf, "%lf %lf", &a0, &a1) != 2) {      
00146     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
00147             stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00148     return -1;
00149   }
00150   q->x[q->n-2] = a0;
00151   q->x[q->n-1] = a1;
00152 
00153   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00154     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00155     if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d "
00156                "(%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf)", 
00157                &k, &xi, &chi0re, &chi0im, &chi1re, &chi1im, 
00158                &b0re, &b0im, &b1re, &b1im, &b2re, &b2im) != 12) {
00159       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
00160               stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00161       return -1;
00162     }
00163     qint->ng[k]++;
00164     qint->xi[k] = xi;
00165     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = chi0re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = chi0im;
00166     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = chi1re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = chi1im;
00167     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = b0re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = b0im;
00168     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6] = b1re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7] = b1im;
00169     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8] = b2re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9] = b2im;
00170   }     
00171   for (k=1; k<q->A; k++) 
00172     qint->idx[k] = qint->idx[k-1]+qint->ng[k-1];
00173 
00174   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00175   if (strncmp(buf, "</Para>", 7)) {
00176     fprintf(stderr, "didn't find </Para>\n");
00177     return -1;
00178   }     
00179 
00180   return 0;
00181 }

00184 int AMDdwrite(FILE* fp, const Para* q)
00185 {
00186   int k, ki, i;
00187   AMDdInternals* qint = q->internals;
00188 
00189   fprintf(fp, "<Para AMDd %s>\n", q->name);
00190   fprintf(fp, "%d %d %d\n", q->A, q->Z, q->N);
00191   fprintf(fp, "%d\n", q->ngauss);
00192   fprintf(fp, "%12.8f  %12.8f\n", q->x[q->n-2], q->x[q->n-1]);
00193   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00194     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++) {
00195       i = qint->idx[k]+ki;
00196       fprintf(fp,
00197               "%2d  %+2d  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)\n",
00198               k, qint->xi[k],
00199               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1],
00200               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3],
00201               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5],
00202               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7],
00203               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9]);
00204   }
00205   fprintf(fp, "</Para>\n");  
00206 
00207   return 0;
00208 }

00211 void AMDdinitSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00212 {
00213   int k, ki;
00214   AMDdInternals* qint = q->internals;
00215 
00216   Q->A = q->A; Q->Z = q->Z; Q->N = q->N;
00217   Q->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00218 
00219   Q->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00220   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00221     Q->idx[k] = qint->idx[k];
00222 
00223   Q->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00224   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00225     Q->ng[k] = qint->ng[k];
00226 
00227   Q->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian));
00228   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++) 
00229     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++)
00230       Q->G[qint->idx[k]+ki].xi = qint->xi[k]; 
00231 }
00232 
00233 
00234 void AMDdtoSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00235 {
00236   AMDdInternals *qint = q->internals;
00237   int i,k,kg;
00238 
00239   i=-1;
00240   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00241     for (kg=0; kg<qint->ng[k]; kg++) {
00242       i++;
00243 
00244       Q->G[i].chi[0] = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1];
00245       Q->G[i].chi[1] = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3];
00246       Q->G[i].a      = (kg == 0 ? q->x[q->n-2] : q->x[q->n-1]);
00247       Q->G[i].b[0]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5];
00248       Q->G[i].b[1]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7];
00249       Q->G[i].b[2]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9];
00250     }
00251 }
00252 
00253 
00254 void AMDdprojectgradSlaterDet(const Para* q,
00255                               const gradSlaterDet* dQ, double* dq)
00256 {
00257   AMDdInternals *qint = q->internals;
00258   int i,k,kg;
00259 
00260   // only converting a complex in a real gradient
00261 
00262   dq[q->n-2] = 0.0;
00263   dq[q->n-1] = 0.0;
00264 
00265   i=-1;
00266   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00267     for (kg=0; kg<qint->ng[k]; kg++) {
00268       i++;
00269 
00270       dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].chi[0]);
00271       dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].chi[0]);
00272       dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].chi[1]);
00273       dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].chi[1]);
00274       dq[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[0]);
00275       dq[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[0]);
00276       dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[1]);
00277       dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[1]);
00278       dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[2]);
00279       dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[2]);
00280       if (kg == 0)
00281         dq[q->n-2] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].a);
00282       else
00283         dq[q->n-1] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].a);
00284     }
00285 }
